SNMP Ruckus Zonedirector 9.5

Overview

Ruckus Zone Director 9.5

Tested with Zabbix 3.2.7 Ruckus Zone Director 9.5 Template.

Tested with objects ID:

-Total Rx/Tx Bytes

-CPU utilization

-MAC Address
